item.title: code and graphic design
item.description:
I wanted to look into the intersection between graphic design and code. I found a program called Processing, where you can code in Java, C++ or Python. After trying a few simple things, this animation seemed to be pretty cool:

The code for it is below. There are two functions that automatically run, setup() (runs once like __init__) and draw() (continuously runs). So I just continuously increased the radius at which that ellipse is at, as well as it’s angle with a couple sines and cosines to make it dynamic.
